snippet: Advice to strangers, well-meaning and otherwise: Look beyond the wheelchair.
abstract: Loose Ends column by author Ben Mattlin reflects on how he is often mistaken for other people who are also confined to a wheelchair, because people seem to think that everyone in wheelchairs look alike; relates some hurtful comments made by presumably well-meaning people.
lead_paragraph: Advice to strangers, well-meaning and otherwise: Look beyond the wheelchair.
